ANU.name: Bartholomew Meehan
interest: Corporate environmental management.Environmentally sustainable facilities management
project: Bart is currently researching the impacts of Covid restrictions on corporate environmental management programs and company/community attitudes.

publication.title: Taking Action: researching an innovative pedagogy for an aesthetic visual approach to environmental issues
publication.source: Current Opinion in Environmental Sustainability, vol. 16, pp. 64-72

publication.title: Creating change: building an environmentally sustainable campus

publication.title: Planning for biodiversity: a challenge for universities
publication.source: in Walter Leal Filho and David Carpenter (ed.), Sustainability in the Australasian University Context, Peter Lang Publishing Group, Freiburg, pp. 101-204

publication.title: rt for earth
